response.overview: Awang is a young warrior on his way to Indraloka castle for a big festival. However he faces multiple obstacles in getting there. When he finally found the castle, he realised there was a gorge before the castle, so he needed to cross the bridge. Awang stopped by a furious creature named Sang Kelembai because Awang injured his head. Sang Kelembai then challenged him in a duel of Ceper, a traditional Malaysian game. Awang accepted the offers and the battles went on for three days. He almost won before Sang Kelembai decided to cheat. Awang gets furious and threatens Sang Kelembai to let him cross the bridge. Awang finally arrived at the castle only to find out that the festival ended three days ago.
response.title: Lintas
